com.ibm.aglets.security
Class PolicyImpl

java.lang.Object
  java.security.Policy
      com.ibm.aglets.security.PolicyImpl

public class PolicyImpl
extends java.security.Policy

The PolicyImpl class is an implementation of Policy abstract class for Aglets.
